author: Special Correspondent
text:
The police thwarted the attempt of the residents of Pottireddipatti village near here to stage a road roko agitation demanding permission to hold jallikattu on Sunday.

Pottireddipatti is a famous centre for jallikattu and the bulls from Salem, Tiruchi, Pudukottai districts used to participate in the event in the past.

With Centre issuing notification lifting the ban on jallikattu, the local people made arrangements for holding the same. However, the Supreme Court slapped a ban on jallikattu.

Protesting against the ban and demanding permission for holding the event, the residents of Pottireddipatti gathered at the local bus stand with the intention of blocking the traffic.

On receiving information, the Erumapatti police rushed to the spot and warned them with stringent action, following which they dispersed.
title: Bid to stage road roko agitation
